channel.title: Homes on RENFEI HUANG @HKUST VISLab
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on RENFEI HUANG @HKUST VISLab

item.description: Biography Renfei is currently a first-year Ph.D. student in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at the Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. Heâ€™s supervisor is Prof. QU Huamin (http://huamin.org). He is a member of VisLab at HKUST (http://vis.cse.ust.hk/). He is also associated with Noah’s Ark Lab at Huawei Hong Kong (http://www.noahlab.com.hk/#/home). He was supervised by Prof. Yunjun GAO (http://mypage.zju.edu.cn/en/gaoyj_en) in his undergraduate study. In his spare time, he enjoys swimming and dancing, such as Ballroom and Latin.

item.title: Projects
item.description: UlTraMan: A Unified Platform for Big Trajectory Data Management and Analytics (VLDB) SP-Cache: Load-balanced, Redundancy-free Cluster Caching with Selective Partition (SC 2018) PlanningVis: A Visual Analytics Approach to Production Planning in Smart Factories (VAST 2019)

item.title: Awards
item.description: First-Class Scholarship for Elite Students in Basic Science (Top 5% in College of Computer Science, 3 times in 2015, 2016 and 2017) Second-Class Scholarship for Outstanding Merits (Top 3 in class), 2015 Huawei PhD Fellowship Scheme (HPFS), 2018
